1121037538146312192.text:
Dear crypto wallets, we need your help:   

We want to make it *much* easier for wallets to integrate @ConnextNetwork. 

If instant payments to the #DaiCard, #BurnerWallet AND @GetMosendo sounds interesting, I'd love to talk to you ASAP so we can understand what you need.

1115053406241132545.text:
This ONE simple trick will bring all the @metamask_io/@TrustWalletApp/@tokenary_app/@infura_io/@Trezor/@Ledger/@fortmatic/@portis_io/@WalletConnect users to your dApp:

yarn add web3-react@next

https://github.com/NoahZinsmeister/web3-react/tree/next …

1122138774186729473.text:
Introducing Matic Wallet - An easy to use Crypto wallet with native support for Plasma chains.

It comes with @WalletConnect and Dagger integrations to provide impeccable user experience.

Read more here https://link.medium.com/t0fdUQ3ieW

1122143737101025280.text:
It's very painful to use @metamask_io when you are using multiple networks with layer-2 DApps.

Matic wallet uses @WalletConnect to handle those complications and provides smooth interactions.

1119931267502477312.text:
One year ago @pedrouid correctly identified that the industry needed to come together and agree on a common set of standards for wallets to connect to other pieces of software.

His tireless hustle, a grant from @ethereum, and a great community of engineers have smashed it. 

https://twitter.com/WalletConnect/status/1119915811098042370 …
